testcase.classname: As an Admin User of the Nop Commerce
testcase.name: Add New Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Dropdown Menu..................................passed And click on customers Item.................................................passed And click on Add new button.................................................passed Then User can view Add new customer page....................................passed When User enter customer info...............................................passed And click on Save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Search Customer by Name
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Dropdown Menu..................................passed And click on customers Item.................................................passed And Enter customer Name.....................................................passed When Click on search button.................................................passed Then User should found Name in the Search table.............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed

Login"...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
